cause.description:
The purpose of this cause is to bring all other causes to their knees and slice their balls off.
Why? Because Megan Hargan-Romero can!
1. Other causes don't stand a chance to this clause
2. This clause will take state by storm.
3. I don't fight, I don't argue, I just hit that bitch with a bottle.
cause.mission: To bring all other causes to their knees.
cause.name: Megan Hargan-Romero's Cause
